label: uncl2017
comment: Code specifying a set of dates/times within a despatch pattern.

values.label: 1st shift (normal working hours)
values.comment: The first working period as defined by an entity.

values.label: 2nd shift
values.comment: A subsequent working period as defined by an entity, that follows 1st shift.

values.label: 3rd shift
values.comment: A subsequent working period as defined by an entity, that follows 2nd shift.

values.label: As directed
values.comment: Shipment/delivery instruction will be provided in an independent communication session.

values.label: Any shift
values.comment: The production period that a product will be built such as 1st shift or 3rd shift.

values.label: 24 hour clock
values.comment: Shipment/deliveries will be specified by a continuous time clock .

values.label: None
values.comment: Used to cancel or override a previous pattern.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: Despatch pattern timing according to agreement.
